data.message: Such great advances. I teared up when the women provided feedback. High five!

replies.message: We're glad you enjoyed the video, Kathy. We'll be sure to pass that high five along to our team. Have a great day! -Sidney
Mind blowing. Keep up the good work. The world needs you.
We'll make sure to keep up the good work, Robert. Here's to making the world a better place! -Rey
Wow. We do learn something new every day. Thanks Facebook.
I'm so excited to know this wonderful technology will open up the world for many. My granddaughter is one them. Mahalo Nui Loa🌺

Facebook Hello Facebook. I am Nikola Radjen,i am writing you from Serbia. I was send one letter to your headquarters adress 1 Hacker Way Menlo Park CA 94025 USA, 22 october has leaved Serbia and it should be now in USA.I am still waiting for any response. I want to know did you read my letter, i had found serious vulnerability on facebook. Please contact me as soon as possible on my email stalker90145@gmail.com. or on my phone number i will provide you just send me message. This is not scam or fraud i have data to offer to Facebook team. Regards, Nikola Radjen
